circumstances: The pilot, sole on board, was completing a cargo flight from Riyan to Aden with an intermediate stop in Al Furt. On approach to runway 35, he observed big birds standing near the runway threshold and opted for a downwind right hand short base landing. On short final, the single engine airplane stalled and crashed. The aircraft was destroyed and the pilot was seriously injured.
probable_cause:
The accident was the consequence of the following: 
- Inappropriate flight technique,
- The last turn was completed below lift speed, 
- Turbulences and windshear may have been contributing factors.
